name: Caveman Jam
description:
An evil robotic ant race has gone back in time to destroy humankind at their weakest — Cave Men.

They've placed them on dangerous floating islands. The cave men are simply no match for for their new environment. (They are as dumb as lemmings...)

You are the only one with the technology and skills to save them from their horrific fate. Save the cave men. Save human kind!
